title: Mac Borderless Mode and more still not fixed since 7.9
body:
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/691o5j/post_79_patch_has_made_lol_unplayable_for_mac/

The issue of the resolution for Mac borderless mode still has not been fixed since patch 7.9. I'd like Riot to stop ignoring Mac players & playtesting as the borderless mode isn't the only issue we're having right now and it's hell to play on a Mac atm.

replies.body: We've had success in getting most of those lingering fullscreen/borderless Mac issues ironed out, so go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they can get yours as well! There's a few tricky methods to getting this fixed, so it's best to have them walk you through each of them one on one.

I'm with you.  So frustrating to play on a window just small enough that if you move your mouse to the edge and click I can actually click out of LoL and start making new folders and s on my desktop.  Borderless used to be so smooth and filled the screen.  Please at least comment RITO!!!  There are like 3-4 separate threads about this issue!
calm down, Riot gave a great reply right below. just scroll down.  Thx
